definition: cooking method/to boil sb alive (capital punishment in imperial China)
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: I studied Greek cuisine for one year.
sentences.chinese: 我学了一年的希腊菜烹饪法。

sentences.english: So I have lots of recipes and when I make a new dish it goes into the computer.
sentences.chinese: 因此我有许多烹饪法并且我制作新的菜肴进入电脑。

sentences.english: Honey can be substituted for sugar in this recipe.
sentences.chinese: 在这种烹饪法里蜂蜜能代替糖。

sentences.english: The recipe recipient transiently made the conscientious alien client unconscious.
sentences.chinese: 烹饪法接受者瞬变使有责任心的外国人客户无意识。

sentences.english: I want to try a new recipe.
sentences.chinese: 我想试一个新的烹饪法。

sentences.english: Steaming is another gentle cooking method popular in Asian cuisines. It produces a mild-tasting fish that is often paired with a flavorful sauce.
sentences.chinese: 清蒸是亚洲菜中另一种常见的温和烹饪法。

sentences.english: This method is done by burying food in the ground under hot stones.
sentences.chinese: 这种烹饪法是将食物埋于地底，放在烧热的石块之下。

sentences.english: I would like to encourage people who attend our potlucks to bring along their recipe.
sentences.chinese: 我希望鼓励人们参加我们的聚餐并带来他们的烹饪法。

definition: way of eating/how something is eaten/how a dish is prepared/the way a dish is to be cooked
to braise/to cook in soy and vinegar/braised/cooked in soy and vinegar
to stir-fry with oil only (no addition of water)
